mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by reg_date, image_nm) as rownum, item_idx, image_idx, image_nm, image_desc, orignl_nm, thumbnail_nm, image_path, image_width, image_height, rep_image, file_size, public_service, reg_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, mod_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS mod_date from nam_image A where item_idx = #{item_idx} order by rownum desc LIMIT #{perPageNum} OFFSET #{pageStart}

select row_number() over(order by reg_date, image_nm) as rownum, item_idx, image_idx, image_nm, image_desc, orignl_nm, thumbnail_nm, image_path, image_width, image_height, rep_image, file_size, public_service, reg_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, mod_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS mod_date from nam_image A where item_idx = #{item_idx}

select row_number() over(order by reg_date desc) as rownum, item_idx, image_idx, image_nm, image_desc, orignl_nm, thumbnail_nm, image_path, image_width, image_height, rep_image, file_size, public_service, reg_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, mod_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS mod_date from nam_image A where item_idx = #{item_idx}
select count(*) from nam_image A where item_idx = #{item_idx}

select count(*) from nam_item_base nib, nam_image ni, nam_org_code noc, nam_possession_code npc where nib.REG_STATE = #{reg_state} and nib.org_code_idx = #{org_code_idx}
and nib.possession_code_idx = #{possession_code_idx}
and nib.ITEM_NO >= convert(#{item_no1}, signed)
and nib.ITEM_NO <= convert(#{item_no2}, signed)
and nib.ITEM_DETAIL_NO >= convert(#{item_detail_no1}, signed)
and nib.ITEM_DETAIL_NO <= convert(#{item_detail_no2}, signed)
and noc.ORG_CODE_IDX = nib.ORG_CODE_IDX and npc.POSSESSION_CODE_IDX = nib.POSSESSION_CODE_IDX and nib.ITEM_IDX = ni.ITEM_IDX
mapper.insert: insert into nam_image ( item_idx, image_nm, orignl_nm, thumbnail_nm, image_path, image_width, image_height, rep_image, file_size, public_service, reg_user, reg_date ) values ( #{item_idx}, #{image_nm}, #{orignl_nm}, #{thumbnail_nm}, #{image_path}, #{image_width}, #{image_height}, #{rep_image}, #{file_size}, #{public_service}, #{reg_user}, now() )
mapper.update: update nam_image set ${colunm} = #{val}, mod_date = now() where image_idx = #{image_idx}
update nam_image set rep_image = #{val}, mod_date = now() where image_idx = #{image_idx}
